channel.title: DemiraeScape
channel.description:
I was always a big fan of Pur3zScape when I was little, I didn't know how to code at the time so I would watch friends and learn and understand what they are saying to me. I took a blank source from Moparscape because Pur3zScape was no longer excising, so I searched and searched for it but I could not find. So one the idea came to me, What if I could make a re-make. I had looked at google to study where every npc was standing but my cords are a little off. I give 90% to credits to Pur3z. I am not leeching his work just trying to re-create the moment, I've added things of my own.
Done Started Not-Started
Castle Of Wars Clan Wars Clan Chat Donater Rank Mod/Admin/Owner Capes StaffZone
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/dynd41.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/30x92bo.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/zjij39.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/w177le.jpg[/img]
This server is not up yet and like I said this is just development.

item.title: DemiraeScape
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

So is your base Pur3zscape or what?
Also you cant have your website posted in pics without permission from a mod.
I’m guessing it’s a 508 because Dragon claws are a custom item.

It’s starting to look pretty good, so good luck.

Read full topic
